website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe king bed frame that does not require a box spring.
pros: Steel legs feature a concave center design to reduce squeaks and creaks
Foldable, making it easy for you to store or transport the frame
Features a weight capacity of 1,500 pounds
Black finish is designed to complement any bedroom's decor
cons: Less sturdy than many comparable options

customer_reviews.title: Great frame just add some plywood.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly fine frame. It does, however, need a layer of plywood on top before the mattress. In reviews, people are claiming its squeaky and it breaks. If you put a layer of plywood down and attach with some simple zip-ties through a few holes, it won’t squeak and will be perfectly sound. And by the way, you should put plywood down on ANY bed frame before putting mattresses down. This is just basic.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I call this the pickup truck of bedframes
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. so tall you can practicaly make a fort out of the underneath. 2. Tall enough to easily see a tv over the heads of animals who like to get in the way. 3. This bed height would be good for people with mobility issues, because you can get on an off it with hardly any bending of the body. 4. The bed frame is portable, and light yet very strong. Cons: 1. The bedframe is just about at knee-height. In confined spaces its too easy to drag or smack a knee against it when moving around. I have already done it twice in less than a week. Ouch!
customer_reviews.author: NinjaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Cloud 9 - Eclectic - Psycho somatic
customer_reviews.text: Remember when the dinosaurs went extinct because of a meteorite. Well this crafty engineered specimen is like a meteorite that should ostensibly wipe out all box springs. Though I thought the middle support legs seemed a little unconventional this thing holds its own. It feels really sturdy to sleep on and unfolding it out of the box without having to put it together made the lazy side of me throw a party. This thing is a dream come true. I got one of those 80 tri-folding foam mattresses and put it on this frame, and for $170 total I'm feeling and sleeping like a princess.
customer_reviews.author: vic tailor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this after dealing with an online mattress company for over a month with faulty product and even worse replacements. I decided to go to my trusty friend Amazon. I ordered it and I wasn't disappointed! I am 5'3" and I was able to put it together really easily. It took may be 20 minutes and I did it on my own. It doesn't squeak or make any noise. I like how high it is as well. I am really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia M. Field

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bed. I had to shop around for a while until I found this one. It is designed so much better than the others. There were no reviews when I bought it, but I could tell the middle support legs seem stronger than others. It's now in my room and is great. Very solid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple & minimal
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together! I was able to do it by myself. One hook wasn't aligned correctly, so I just used a hammer to get it on & it worked out fine. I was surprised, because when I turned it over, the frame was a lot higher than it appeared. I can now lay high above the ground, but I'm relieved it was so simple to put together!
customer_reviews.author: rosexduskTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Queen sized frame with multiple uses!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this particular frame for the height and also the added bonus of creating our “one of a kind” sectional lounge sofa bed that can easily convert into a queen sized bed for overnight guests. We had a small tight space that we wanted to turn into a den like atmosphere for reading on a warm summer day in front of the sliding doors. Unfortunately the room was not extremely wide and a sofa was extremely large, even the sofas labeled for “tiny space” use. This worked out far better than we ever had expected and everyone loves our lounge space!
customer_reviews.author: JGenest

customer_reviews.title: sturdy frame
customer_reviews.text: It came in on time. Seems very sturdy. It was very easy to put together. There were only two bolts that came with it to hold both sides together. All the wing nuts needed to be tightened though. So far no squeeky noises. I bought a new 18" dust ruffle to go on & love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Great for big people
customer_reviews.text: Its just as sturdy as promised. Silent. Tall. It is nearly perfect. The only thing wrong with it is that the mattress slips. I need to fix it daily, even multiple times a day. My hubby and are are both big people. Both 6ft+ both 250+. It's sturdy, which was the main concern.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and ALOT of space!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I'm on my second night and it seems sturdy and simple. My days of needing oversized wooden bedroom furniture are over! I assembled this bed by myself in under 30 minutes. At 5'10, I was pleasantly surprised by the space under it. I sincerely underestimated what 17" was. I'm using my box spring with it and I have to use a step stool to climb into bed!! I would def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Had a busted queen sized box spring from moving. Looked at 2 piece box springs, cool.. But saw products like this that replace the box spring & frame, looked at the 2 or 3 options and decided this was the best! And it is! Took 30 minutes to set up from unboxing to bed is made! Real light and easy to work with but sturdy and great design! Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Need a very good mattress for this frame.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big man so I purchase because it could hold my weight, however after putting on my new mattress I could feel the poles under the mattress and my back was really hurting so this was not for me and I had to return it. This frame needs a box spring. Other than that this is a great bed, nice and high and plenty of space for storage under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: fullofit

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to wait til we had ‘tested’ this over time. We’ve used for about a year solid now. It was quite simple to set up, does have decent storage for medium sized boxes or bins, and definitely stands up to the weight of the Zunis mattress plus our combined fluffiness (595lbs) plus our pets, a 53 lb pup and a 15 lb kitty.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morlock

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed was very easy to set up--no tools needed, and when set up it feels very sturdy - no wobbling or squeaking. It has a high under-bed space for putting baskets or containers to store stuff in (important feature for me). High quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to set up full bed 2 frames. Or you can leave them apart for 2 single beds.
customer_reviews.text: I love it for my small room. I have an airmattress on it right now until my mattress arrives. Made the airmattress firmer than when it was just on the floor. Comes in 2 side by side frames which will also would be great for 2 single beds if not attached. I'm a 61 year old women and had no problems setting it up alone.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Queen bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Nice stable, solid bed frame. If set up properly, it will not make noise like other reviews I read. If you already have a bed frame with wood slats, think about replacing the slats with a frame like this.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shogrin

customer_reviews.title: Not Weight Compatible
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had the bed for almost a month and it broke and I thought it was and it broke
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L Dorbin

customer_reviews.title: horrible craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: It seems sturdy enough. I really can't tell because 4 of the 8 brackets will not fit over the screws. I've tried everything I can think of to make them fit, but the screws were placed too high. Unfortunately, I can't return this due to the weight. I guess I'll have to rig something up to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: F Spires

customer_reviews.title: Sister New Jersey
customer_reviews.text: This rain is very strong had a little difficulty putting it together because I didn't read instructions but I figure it out and it was much easier to put it together it really ain't that much to do the only problem I had was connecting the clip onto the legs other than that it's a very strong study frame in the storage room underneath is awesome I love it
customer_reviews.author: Nan Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple setup
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up! The frame is very sturdy and fits perfectly inside of my queen bed. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Tall (18 inches) so there is plenty of under bed storage. Sturdy. Lightweight. Easy and relatively quick to assemble when you follow the directions. I ordered the queen size and it works great. Quiet and supporting. I have a foam mattress so with the height of this frame I decided to forgo the boxspring. Great price and worth the money. Also has holes to screw into a headboard and footboard if desired.
customer_reviews.author: Schopick Family

customer_reviews.title: Good height, no box spring needed
customer_reviews.text: The height of this bed frame is great. We topped it with just a mattress, no box spring and it doesn’t look too low. Our full grown Labrador retriever likes to hide under it, so there’s definitely enough space for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Melvin

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required but won’t keep the mattress on the frame
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed because it literally came assembled and it just folded out from the box. However I dislike that it doesn’t keep the mattress from sliding off the frame perhaps adding a few u shaped holding bars on the ends to keep it in place for future design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame for my teenage son's twin XL mattress specifically for the extra space underneath. So far, so good! It's a platform style with 18" of space underneath (definitely needed for kids/teens). It was super easy to assemble... in fact, he did it all himself within 10-15 minutes with no problem. Highly recommended for those looking for an inexpensive bed frame with the added bonus of it being a platform style (extra space underneath). 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my queen sized Modway Aveline 10" Gel-Infused Memory Foam Mattress, and so far it has worked really well. The under bed clearance on it is nice, even my big totes fit underneath. There are a lot of legs, but I guess those help it to be sturdy. So far its just me, 220lbs. I was worried the mattress would slide, but so far it hasn't. Granted I have a cover on it, so that helps. I haven't tried jumping in the bed, or anything more vigorous.
customer_reviews.author: braingamer47

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my guest room and can keep all of my extra blankets and pillows in totes under the bed and now have an organized linen closet. Tons of room!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: All three of our beds (two queens and one split king) now have these frames. This is the first 18” and I wish they were all this high. With no basement or usable attic and a one car garage, these frames are like a storage closet. In addition, they are so much sturdier than any other frames and don’t shift and squeak. Unfold and four bolts and you’re done!
customer_reviews.author: MaureenGB

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, mattress has NO corner guide walls...slides all over the frame!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up RETURNING this frame as there are no corner guide walls to hold the mattress in place on the frame! This should have been discovered during their prototype design/engineering phase. Otherwise, I would have loved it as it has a wonderful amount of room for storage underneath. Too bad, it would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: BK - Walled Lake, MI

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't recommend for over 350lbs.
customer_reviews.text: Some welds on this frame failed and as a result, I have to purchase a different one in less than a year. I bought for a family member who weighs around 350lbs (it's advertised for up to 1500lbs) and after not even a year, the weak welds on this frame gave way and we have to buy a new frame. Because of that, I wouldn't recommend. It was easy to set up, but that was the only plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Easy, sturdy, good storage
customer_reviews.text: I hate low beds and I ordered the 18 inch king frame, it's very tall! Loads of room under for storage and it was very easy to put together. I even ordered a head board and was able to attach it to the frame with a modified screw plate that the headboard came with.
customer_reviews.author: Domenique

customer_reviews.title: Solid base. Way up in the air.
customer_reviews.text: It's solid and went together in a snap. I may have underestimated how tall 18 inches is. My bed looks like it is on stilts. Yes it's a lot of storage under it now but I may have to get a springboard to get in bed. It's nice but I would go with the 14 or 16 inch rise next time. Great value though because I put the time I and kept hinting for the lowest price.
customer_reviews.author: TK Prime

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have bought something else.
customer_reviews.text: been using it for a little while now and it's already creaking. I'm not that heavy of a person, just about 160lbs. the other problem I'm having with this frame is my bed slides so easily and I find I have to re adjust my bed at least once a day. I wish I would have bought a different frame.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Value for price
customer_reviews.text: The leg supports were very tight and hard to manipulate so it was hard to assemble without a hammer and screwdriver (neither recommended by the manufacturer). The bed seems sturdy enough and the height is perfect for not needing a box springs. I would suggest some method of covering the base though to prevent the base from tearing the mattress or mattress cover. The height also allows for deep plastic bins for under bed storage. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Sturdy, and Nice to lay on (fun fact: same headline on my Tinder profile)
customer_reviews.text: I’m just a gal that can’t follow instructions but found assembling this was impossible to mess up. I’ve had this now for about 3 months and I read other reviews where they stated there is/feels like a lump in middle when laying on it but I haven’t experienced this. Best sleep I’ve had on a year and am so happy I purchased
customer_reviews.author: amanda b miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed frame
customer_reviews.text: We got this bed frame when we got our purple mattress 4 months ago. It has held up super nice!!! The storage underneath is super convenient too. I wouldn't say we are super wild in bed, but it has been sturdy and never even makes a creak. Only problem is finding a bedskirt this long :)
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Leg Braces and bolt were not correct distance
customer_reviews.text: the braces that stabilize the legs did not match the bolt position. In any manufacturing process recalibration will be required. Quality control at the factory should have caught this error, it was very evident the swinging brace on the leg would not properly hook the anchor bolt. This is a shame because otherwise the frame seems to be as promised, arrived preassembled, sturdy/strong construction. There are four braces on each frame, that's 8 bolts, NONE were usable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the boxspring in the basement and this bed frame works great with just the mattress! It's high enough to be able to store 17" high boxes underneath. It was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. Perfect for the guest room area in our basement!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sala

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: VERY easy to put together. We used it without a box spring and no issues yet. The height provides a decent amount of storage space without making it too difficult to get in and out of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara R.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT frame!
customer_reviews.text: I had the twin size of this frame, and decided to upgrade to a Queen. Love the extra storage space, but for a "heavy-duty" steel, this seems less substantial than the twin-sized frame, I assume to save on weight. No sturdiness issues so far, but wish the steel were a little thicker, just for my own peace of mind. LOVE this frame otherwise!! So easy to put together, and the twin is now folded for storage as a second guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: kewlstuff33

customer_reviews.title: Just the right height. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to set up. I had a little trouble with some of the support brackets on the legs but my husband was able to snap them in place. We set this up in a few minutes. We put our mattress on it and the mattress seems much firmer and better supported than when we had it on the box spring. Very sturdy. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: carhar

customer_reviews.title: I’m high on this bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! It was extremely easy to put up, I won’t even say assemble because it was just that easy. It only took about 15-20 min total. The space underneath came in handy since I had just gotten rid of my platform bed with built in drawers and was in desperate need of a place to organize and store my clothes. This bed is perfect and I can easily slide tubs and other storage compartments underneath. My kids love the height, it brings our television closer to eye level. This frame and your mattress is all that you need, I experience and enjoy the same comfort as I did with my platform bed.
customer_reviews.author: T Francis

customer_reviews.title: smh
customer_reviews.text: NO HARDWARE TO CONNECT THE BED. can't contact seller and Amazon wants me to send the whole thing back for two screws. that's two much work. just know this may require a home depot run. I was lucky enough to have screws to match the ones needed as I bought a unit for my brother. great storage with a little tetris (sp?) I was able to fit 8 bins 2 suitcases a small baskets and still has a smidg of room left
customer_reviews.author: GABRIELLE E GARLEY

customer_reviews.title: Queen bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I like this frame, I love the storage capacity underneath. It wasn't super easy to put together and I got hurt a few times. Also, it'd be kind of nice if the holes connecting the frames together were drilled on all sides so it doesn't matter which way you put it. I got it all put up with my mattress on it then realized the holes didn't line up. Sooo I'm getting zip ties. But feels very sturdy otherwise and I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Very tall get an 8' matress
customer_reviews.text: Very tall, too tall for standing doggy style if you have a 16-18 matress if you get a 8 it'd be perfect but it doesn't squeek even if you get real rough right on the end of it ya get in a rough rythem it'll knock against the wall tho but the frame doesn't make any sound, the storage space is really good I cleared up almost a whole spare bedroom worth of stuff
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a full 5 stars but it was missing the pre drilled holes to keep the 2 pieces together. At 1st I thought maybe they sent me the wrong frames but one side did have holes in it, but only on 1 end. I currently have them stuck together with heavy duty zip ties and I'm hoping for the best, but other than that it was super easy to unpack and unfold and get it set up. If it wasn't for missing those pre drilled holes this would have been a perfect review. If you're handy with a drill, this might not even be an issue for you. For reference, I bought the 18".
customer_reviews.author: John Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Lot of space to storage under the bed. Super easy to assemble, I did it by myself. And for now, definitely worth the price. I will write again in a couple months to see if the quality in terms of time reflects what just said.
customer_reviews.author: Asia Adducci

customer_reviews.title: Great frame it was surprising.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband were really surprised about this frame. We looked at several and decided on this one. It was super easy to assemble. That was great. Our Beautyrest Black fit it well no problems and the storage underneath the frame works well too. Really well. We also purchased a bed skirt from Amazon which hides everything under the bed. We have a new room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have had this a year with company a few times.
customer_reviews.text: They never knew there was no box springs and I have a ton of things stored in huge containers all under the bottom. I do embroidery and sewing and you know what that means.... if you want a closet, use the underside of the bed which is what this helped us with. It's great. Plan on doing this with my king size bed soon.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Dudai

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as intended
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to put together. Looked like it would last. The mattress settles into the bars and you could feel every bar on the frame. Super uncomfortable. I purchased this so I would not need a box spring and you would really need something with this. I returned it. Return was no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer87654

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design - exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AN EXCELLENT DESIGN. IT STANDS TALL, SO... DEPENDING ON THE DEPTH OF YOUR MATTRESS, THIS CAN BE A "LEAP" INTO BED. We are using this as a temporary mattress frame until our permanent bed frame arrives. We will store it and use for our Aero Bed for when company arrives. Nobody needs to crawl out of bed from the floor! Very happy with its sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Polczynski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and quick to set up. Nice height and like the area underneath for storage. I would highly recommend this frame.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi k.

customer_reviews.title: Good frame. But not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good frame. But it does not suit my taste. When I opened the box, and pulled it out of the box. I felt the texture of the metal frame in my hand, really coarse and rough, compared to other bedframe I had over the years that they had a fine smooth finishing. So I decided to return it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage underneath
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our spare room and to store Christmas items underneath; it’s sturdy and we store our Christmas tree box and three tubs underneath, get a long drop dust ruffle, works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: k tenges

customer_reviews.title: We've bought 3 of these!
customer_reviews.text: We've bought the full, king, and queen sizes of these. We love them!! They are easy to install, sturdy and the height is perfect. We have to standard spring mattresses on the full and queen, and a memory foam mattress on the king. None seem be having any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Meeko

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed frame! The storage underneath is exactly what I was looking for. I have a small room and I need space for out of season clothes, laundry hamper, extra shoes, etc. I do however have to purchase king/cal king comforter so it reaches all the way to the floor. It is also very sturdy holding a 10.5 inch queen mattress perfectly and assembling it took less than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Flores

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 270 pounds and the legs on one side have bent so badly it is unusable, 4 months after purchase. The metal is so flimsy I can bend it with my bare hands if I really try.
customer_reviews.author: David Ace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've now had for two months. Assembly was easy, took maybe ten minutes with no tools and little savvy. Feels solid, is silent, and a good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Very !! easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I did needed a little hammer for two of the corners to "push" them into the slot , other than that it was very easy and clear to set up! (I am a woman of 70 years old) It took only 15 minutes and. I choose a Queen frame . I must say it is rather high but I have a King bedspread so it does not lye on the floor and in the morning I am on my feet immediately which is great. Thanks! Bernadette
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Van der Ploeg

customer_reviews.title: Support arms hard to hook
customer_reviews.text: The support arms cannot be hooked onto the bolt Edit: assembled it but you have to get an extra person to help you because support arms are really hard to hook onto the bolt
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCassandra

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s been great 👍
customer_reviews.text: It’s been great taller than I expected but I actually really like it. I hope it continues to hold together since I’m plus sized but so far it’s been Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry🦉

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant with the style of this frame, but it works really well. There is a lot of storage room. The bed slides a little on top but that doesn’t bother us.
customer_reviews.author: Desaraye McCue

customer_reviews.title: XL Twin Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, both long and high. Can easily store under bed (15+ inches). Easier to get out of bed, no need for a board between frame and mattress, very sturdy with locking wing nuts.
customer_reviews.author: T. N. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to assemble, and appears sturdy
customer_reviews.text: One of our kids has a bad back and asked for a bed with better support than the old ones in the guest room. We got this frame with a new mattress and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kflier66

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I weigh over 400lbs this bed holds me up great. My to boys can get in with me. It is quite. I bought one for me and my one for my kids room. It is worth it. Great storage underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Taller than expected once the mattress and base were added.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Super sturdy. Easy storage space underneath, as the supports are not at a 45* angle, like others I've seen. Only downside is that while 18" of storage underneath sounds amazing...it makes our bed crazy high! I am 5'9" tall and have to literally CLIMB up into bed at night. The upside is that the dog can't jump that high, so I don't have to share leg space with her. Would be perfect height for a mattress that doesn't need a boxspring. Our SleepNumber needs the base it came with.
customer_reviews.author: D Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent and durable enough item perfect for your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: sleeping well
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I am so happy with this product. It allowed me the flexibility of not needing a box spring. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: cherylann wardlow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this frame. I've never had one before so I wasn't sure what to expect. I can honestly say this is the only set up I would ever have. Very sturdy, quiet, great support for my memory foam mattress. Had it put together and ready to use in 5-10 minutes. Definitely recommend this frame.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great but bigger than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: First of all I love it now but make sure you measure it first! This is very tall and I didn’t take my bed height into consideration. I’m 5’10 it’s still high for me. But I’ve had this for about a year and I love it now. It works great and it’s very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed frame for my new apartment since I was down sizing and needed more space for storage. I’ve had this frame for 6 months and it’s holding up great. I have a very heavy Tempur-pedic mattress and it’s held up fine with both mine and my boyfriends weight. Only squeaks a little bit with movement but nothing too bad. Highly recommend this frame!
customer_reviews.author: Jillliiaan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I do not need a box spring and I have plenty of room under the frame to keep some of my storage boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Alcantar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use quickly with a mattress only. Easy to set up, mattress does not slide at all. Good night's sleep for two grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money
customer_reviews.text: We only had the bed since the first week in May 2019, about a week or so ago the bed started making squeaky sounds when you move to adjust yourself. Not sure how manufacturer will address issue if at all, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: MORE ROOM for me n my dog. She likes to stretch out too
customer_reviews.text: Its ready for my mattress comin tomorrow. Meanwhile, my other one is on for now. STURDY !!! As long as you put it together right...
customer_reviews.author: VOTE OUT TRUMP AND HIS A**KISSERS !!! ESPECIALLY MCCONNELL !!!

customer_reviews.title: Convenient product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product - would order again but in a shorter version. Adding a mattress on top of an 18" frame creates a nice look but for older folks - quite a hike to the top!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not right for our air mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but had to send it back because when we placed our air mattress on top it was about 36” high...it looked rediculous. It was either send back the frame or buy another thinner air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: A. Diodato

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have one of these for 2 different beds, way better than a box spring and frame. Sturdy, quiet, tall, what more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: T. Fleury

customer_reviews.title: I love the height of this frame and the easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I love the height of this frame and the easy setup. I needed the storage space under it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cornelia L Rogers

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits storage tubes underneath. Extremely sturdy-- 2 heavyset people can sleep with no issues. Great composition and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: H$ta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Frame!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this frame I had a headboard with wooden slats tat need to be replaced. It fits perfectly into my already existing headboard frame. The only thing is I would have gotten the 14in instead because the bed is high and there is a little gap in between. But this frame is silent I was able to put the mattress directly on top.
customer_reviews.author: shante lawrence

customer_reviews.title: great memory foam base
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great for my 8 inch memory foam mattress ,nice and sturdy and easy to assemble ,just unfold the two halves and bolt together .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, unfold legs, clip down latch and adde two screws to connect the frames. Really y’all you won’t need a box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gaston-Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I liked how y’all it actually sits up. Plenty of room to put storage drawers and such. Been extremely sturdy with no signs of letting up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great height for mattress and storing tubs under. Saved us money by not having to by frame and foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Stable, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: No issues whatsoever. Bed frame is sturdy, quiet, and has lots of storage space underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amused

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and doesn't squeak
customer_reviews.text: Really nothing to dislike about the frame. It's sturdy and doesn't make any noise whatsoever. It's pretty high with plenty of space underneath. Never going back to a box spring again.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together and extremely sturdy. And I love the height. I've put a foam mattress on (so no box spring) which makes it a good height for me. Plus I can store my large totes under it easily.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, very sturdy, tons of storage room underneath bed, very easy to assemble in less that 1/2 hour. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BGH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Frame for Storage
customer_reviews.text: I love all the storage this has. I fit about 9 containers that are H15.5x16x25. The actual space underneath is about 16" for anyone wondering. 18" is the overall height of the frame. No squeaking at all so far. Installation is super easy. The only thing is you have to really squeeze the one latch bar really hard to get it on.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I buy one of theses frames every couple years they work like they should and are sturdy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Coalton Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Great bed frame easy to assemble very sturdy plenty of storage underneath would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its word
customer_reviews.text: I had a little problem locking it together It took some muscle , I did it by myself. My daughter purchased one the next two days after. Loves storage.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret UterMalcolm

customer_reviews.title: Box spring? Never again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for storage space. Took 10 minutes to assemble. Is made sturdy. Made my old Sealy mattress feel brand new. No noise. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Joe The Steamfitter

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy frame and was so easy to set up. Only tool needed a blade to get it out of box/packaging. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed! This makes a great bed for my kids when they come home!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, missing one thing...
customer_reviews.text: I like but it would be helpful if there were a piece on the frame to keep the mattress from sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Jalover24

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: I love this frame. Used to having and sleeping on a futon or a bed a few inches off the ground, but I legit feel so high up and almost fall getting down because I’m not used to the height. Be that as it may, I love my bed, and it is a great price (got full size)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, small footprint, great for underneath storage.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. My son uses it with a high-density foam mattress and no box spring. Substantial amount of storage underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Waddell

customer_reviews.title: These are nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together built pretty good we have bought two and really like them
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Mattress Frame
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the frame i purchased was not used. I do, however, give credit to the sturdiness and ease of assembly to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Best Price Mattress King Bed Frame - 18" Metal Platform Bed Frame w/Heavy Duty Steel Slat Mattress Foundation (No Box Spring Needed), King Size
product_meta.description: Size:KingBest Price Mattress dual-use steel bed frame/foundation is a complete support system that replaces the need for the traditional box spring and bed frame. It is constructed with 100% steel to provide maximum support and durability for long-lasting use. You will find that its 12 points of contact from the mattress to the floor adds strength, stability and level support. And, our innovative design allows the dual-use steel bed frame/foundation to be folded for portability. Another feature is the 17 inches of under-bed storage to keep those needed items conveniently stored away.
feature_bullets: King Platform Bed Frame with Smart Base Mattress Support System to Replace Traditional Frame & Box Spring
Durable and Noise Free Construction with Heavy Duty Steel Legs with Concarved Center Leg Design for Safety
17" Vertical Clearance for Convenient Under-the-Bed Storage Space
Easy to be Assembled in Minutes and Foldable for Better Storage and Transportation
Product Dimension: (L) 76 Inches x (W) 80 Inches x (H) 18 Inches (5 Year Manufacturer Warranty)
